attributes.action: Stop anti motorist policies and reverse damaging road restrictions.
attributes.additional_details: Motorists across the UK are facing rising costs and restrictions that make daily travel often almost impossible. Potholes damage vehicles and risk lives, Some Speed cameras are erected and left on roads even when there is no reduction in accidents. LTNs also create congestion and disruption. These policies unfairly impact workers, families, and businesses that rely on cars. The Government must act to now. Immediate action is needed.
attributes.background:
We want the Government to: Urgent repairs to damaged roads, Limit speed cameras to genuine safety sites, Stop excessive parking charges, Scrap any plan for pay-per-mile, Remove unnecessary road closures and LTNs.
Drivers are being unfairly hit from all sides, and we want immediate action.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following:

Fix Our Roads: National Plan on Dangerous Potholes Now
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739014

Do not introduce pay-per-mile road charging for UK drivers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749667

Remove speed cameras from motorways to improve safety and fairness
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749184

Ban Low Traffic Neighbourhood schemes
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/753808
